column2: unconstitutional and illegal revolt through both organized and disorganized
stratagem to cause internal strife and armed conflict which may be aimed at -
(a) change of the constitutional structures of governance,

(c)  unseating  of  key  government  officials, 
through  undemocratic 
and

unconstitutional  means,  all  of  which  often  result 
in  violence,  death  and
stagnation and even depredation of the economy.
